Articles.Content:
...or should that be Kloviet Union?

This is my texture pack/reskin/whatever you want to call it, based on the iconography and colour-schemes of the Soviet Union. You can finally make a Sputnik rip-off!

Here are some pics:

It is made using the most recent experimental build (v0.11 x3), but should be compatible with the latest standard version.

Installation instructions are included in the ReadMe file.

Download from MediaFire here:

http://www./?on4ba0o4cautt4f

Thanks for checking this out, and please be constructive with any criticism, because this is my first reskin!
TBH it looks like you just paint bucketed red and sickle/hammer crosses on everything. No offense
Any chance that you could make it with the same colors without the icons?

Any chance that you could make it with the same colors without the icons?

I could do that, but I\'m a selfish prick who just finished his own personal texture pack. Maybe later mate.

To be honest, their stuff was more green/unpainted metal/white...which would be a nice change from the gray parts we have right now.

Example, Salyut 6 mock-up...: http://www.astronautix.com/graphics/s/salyut6.jpg The color isn\'t all that great in this one, but you see what I mean.

Any chance that you could make it with the same colors without the icons?

Here you go:

http://www./?ufniofx0zkh6f67

TBH it looks like you just paint bucketed red and sickle/hammer crosses on everything. No offense

I bet they explode like soviet ships though.

Nice necro.

(mods, that is the codeword for lock this thread)

Nice necro.

(mods, that is the codeword for lock this thread)

it is his first post EVER so cut him some slack. Rather strange the op didn\'t make a soviet parachute. I\'ve had one for AGES!

I bet they explode like soviet ships though.

Welcome to the Forums!
As a general rule, don\'t post in old threads. Whatever went on there tends to be irrelevant, unless there is a special case. This is not a special case.

Nice necro.

(mods, that is the codeword for lock this thread)

As a general rule, don\'t post in old threads. Whatever went on there tends to be irrelevant, unless there is a special case. This is not a special case.

Er... Yes, the thread is old, but it\'s also someone\'s project. A released file. If someone wants to post talking about said file, then I\'d think they can. Just because nobody else has in a while doesn\'t mean people may not still be interested in the contents of the thread. In this case the post was rather pointless, but still.
